required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of XY0206 Tablets in Patients With Relapsed / Refractory Acute Myeloid Leukemia
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Open, Dose Increasing Phase I Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Primary Efficacy of xy0206 Tablets in Relapsed / Refractory Acute Myeloid Leukemia Subjects

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: The occurrence of Maximum tolerable dose.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: The occurrence of Dose limiting toxicity.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: The occurrence rate of Adverse event.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: The occurrence rate of adverse drug reactions.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: The occurrence rate of Serious adverse events.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: Check whether the red blood cell system, white blood cell system and platelet system are normal

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: Urine routine examination includes urine color, transparency, pH, red blood cells, white blood cells, epithelial cells, tube type, protein, specific gravity and urine sugar.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: Routine stool tests include the detection of red and white blood cells in feces, bacterial sensitivity test, occult blood test (OB) and inspection of eggs.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: The contents of various ions, sugars, lipids, proteins, enzymes, hormones and metabolites in blood were detected

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: Evaluation of pancreatic function

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: Four coagulation parameters including prothrombin time (PT), activated partial thromboplastin time (APTT), thrombin time (TT) and fibrinogen (FIB) were evaluated.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: Evaluation of QT interval

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: To evaluate the electrophysiological condition of the heart

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: Chest X-ray/CT

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: One of the vital signs.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: Assess whether systolic blood pressure and diastolic blood pressure are normal

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: One of the vital signs.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: Assess if breathing is normal

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: Assess if the skin is normal.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: Head examination includes head, eyes, ears, nose, lips, etc.Assess if head is normal

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: Neck examination includes thyroid gland, lymph node, etc.Assess if neck is normal.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: Chest examination includes lung, cardiovascular, etc.Assess if chest is normal.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: Abdominal examination includes liver and spleen.Assess if abdomen is normal.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: Assess if limbs is normal.

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: Assess nerve function by communication

primary_outcome.time_frame: from the start of the medication to the end of the study or 28 days after cessation of medication
primary_outcome.description: Assess if back/spine is normal.

intervention.description: Dosage form:Tablet;Multiple dose phase:Take the medicine once a day,1 tablet at a time.4 weeks of continuous medication is one course of treatment. After the first course of treatment, the subjects can continue to receive the experimental drug treatment until they meet the withdrawal criteria. The duration and interval of treatment were determined according to the accumulated condition after multiple dose.

overall_official.affiliation: Institute of Hematology, Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences

facility.name: Institute of Hematology, Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences
